remarks: The converse of isomorphism H is one-to-one.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2014.)
statement:
dihcnv11.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihcnv11.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihcnv11.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihcnv11.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ran I ) $.
dihcnv11.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ran I ) $.
dihcnv11 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( `' I ` X ) = ( `' I ` Y ) <-> X = Y ) ) $.
